key.name: launcher-reveal-edge
key.description: From which edge should the launcher reveal.

key.name: launcher-reveal-edge-timeout
key.description: How long (in ms) wait before revealing the launcher when the mouse pointer is touching the edge. (1 - 1000)

key.name: launcher-hide-mode
key.description: Make the launcher hide automatically after some time of inactivity: always or just when the focussed window is not over the launcher (0 = Never, 1 = Autohide, 2 = Dodge Windows, 3 = Dodge Active Window)

key.name: show-launcher
key.description: Make the launcher appear with that key

key.name: keyboard-focus
key.summary: Key to put keyboard-focus on launcher
key.description: Set the keyboard-focus on the launcher so it can be navigated with the cursor-keys

key.name: execute-command
key.description: Key to open a folder or execute a command

key.name: panel-first-menu
key.summary: Key to open the first panel menu
key.description: Open the first menu on the panel, allowing keyboard navigation thereafter.

key.name: alt-tab-timeout
key.summary: Automatically grid windows on timer in switcher
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-bias-viewport
key.summary: Bias alt-tab sorting to prefer windows on the current viewport
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-forward
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-prev
key.summary: Key to start the switcher in reverse
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-right
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-left
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-detail-start
key.summary: Key to expose the windows in the switcher
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-detail-stop
key.summary: Key to collapse windows in the switcher
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-next-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the switcher
key.description: fixme

key.name: alt-tab-prev-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the switcher backwards
key.description: fixme

key.name: show-minimized-windows
key.description: Hack to enable minimized windows in switcher. Disable and report bugs if problems are caused

key.name: backlight-mode
key.description: Change how the icons are backlit (0 = Backlight Always On, 1 = Backlight Toggles, 2 = Backlight Always Off, 3 = Edge Illumination Toggles, 4 = Backlight and Edge Illumination Toggles)

key.name: launch-animation
key.description: Animation played when a launcher icon is in the process of spawning a process (0 = None, 1 = Pulse Until Running, 2 = Blink)

key.name: urgent-animation
key.description: Animation played when a launcher icon is in the urgent state (0 = None, 1 = Pulse, 2 = Wiggle)

key.name: panel-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Panel background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: launcher-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Launcher background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the launcher icons (32 - 64)

key.name: autohide-animation
key.description: Animation played when the launcher is showing or hiding (0 = Fade on bfb and Slide, 1 = Slide only, 2 = Fade only, 3 = Fade and Slide)

key.name: dash-blur-experimental
key.description: Type of blur in the Dash (0 = No Blur, 1 = Static Blur, 2 = Active Blur)

key.name: automaximize-value
key.description: The minimum value to trigger automaximize. (1 - 100)

key.name: devices-option
key.description: Show devices in the launcher (0 = Never, 1 = Only Mounted, 2 = Always)
